returns._0: The amount of tokens available to be claimed
The amount of tokens locked in the vesting contract

vestTokens(address,uint256).details: This function is callable by the StakeUp token only

params.account: The account to track vested tokens for
params.amount: The amount of tokens to track

availableTokens(address).notice: Get the amount of tokens available to be claimed by an account

claimAvailableTokens().notice: Claim available vested tokens for an account

currentBalance(address).notice: Get the amount of tokens that are currently locked in the vesting contract for an account

vestTokens(address,uint256).notice: Set the accounting variables to track vested tokens for an account
